CustomField.description: Value is 1 if there is at least one completed execution of types ftest/prodtest/silk/selenium, or if the test case ftest ID is non-null (workaround for an old bug in the annotation uploader) Value is 0 otherwise
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A test case is automated when the ftest ID field of any of its children if non-null OR when there is a child execution with type=ftest/prodtest/silk/selenium and its status is Passed
CustomField.label: Automation Completed?
